Good network: connection may take some time
Average network: enabling fallback routes, though connection may fail
Poor network: enabling fallback routes, though connection may fail
Success rate is an estimate based on host and client NAT types, for reference only!
View Logs
Close the log and return to the feature page.
You can share logs on the launcher\'s multiplayer page to provide more information for error analysis.
Share Multiplayer Core log
No log found
You legally promise to strictly abide by all laws and regulations of your country or region during the multiplayer process.
User Notice
Terracotta is a third-party open source free software. Please provide feedback on any issues you encounter through the relevant channels during use.

Terracotta uses P2P technology. After a successful connection, users in the room will connect directly to each other, and no third-party server will relay your traffic. The final multiplayer experience largely depends on the network conditions of the participants.
During the entire multiplayer process, you must strictly comply with all laws and regulations of your country and region.

This will also stop scanning LAN worlds.

This will stop creating the room.

Invitation code (Copied):
Copy invitation code
Invitation code has been copied to clipboard
Please remind your friends to select Guest mode in the multiplayer feature and enter this invitation code.
This will also close the room, other guests will leave and cannot rejoin.
Joining room
This will not stop other guests from joining the room.
Room Joined
This will not stop other guests from joining the room.
Please launch the game, select Multiplayer, and double-click Terracotta Lobby. Backup address:
Copy Backup address
Backup address has been copied to clipboard
Please do not use this address unless necessary.
Connection lost
Please try again
Failed to join room: Room is closed or network unstable
Room connection lost: Room is closed or network unstable
Failed to join room: EasyTier crashed, please report this issue to developers
Failed to create room: EasyTier crashed, please report this issue to developers
Room closed: You exited the game world, room closed automatically
Invalid Protocol: Host has sent invalid response, please report this issue to developers
Please grant the application VPN permission first.
Player List
Anonymous Player
Host
Yourself
Guest
Host Tutorial
Guest Tutorial
Host Tutorial:
Guest Tutorial:
- Read the user notice in the launcher\'s multiplayer homepage, and then enable the multiplayer function.
- Launch the game, find the multiplayer menu in the in-game FCL menu, and open it.
- If a pop-up prompts you to request VPN permissions, please grant; otherwise, it will not work properly.
- This software supports offline accounts.
- This software supports interconnection with software that supports the Scaffolding protocol, such as FCL, HMCL, and PCL CE (Terracotta).
- Click "I want to host a session", to scan the game port.
- Open the game and turn on the "Open to LAN" option in the game settings.
- Wait for a moment and the invite code will be automatically copied. If it is not automatically copied, you can also copy it manually in the multiplayer menu.
- Send the invite code to your friends
- Click "I want to join a session", enter the invitation code provided by the host in the input box, and wait patiently.
- After it shows that you have joined the room, select Multiplayer, and double-click Terracotta Lobby.
- When joining the game using the backup server address, offline accounts are not supported. Please solve this problem yourself.
Notes:
Multiplayer is currently only supported in China. Other regions are not yet supported. We are not responsible for any issues that may arise if you use this feature outside of China.
